import { Columns, Column, Box, IconArrowUpRight, Text, Flex, FlexSpacer } from '@vtex/admin-ui'

Merchants use Form pages to make changes and submit data to create objects or edit existing ones such as products, sellers or promotions.

<br />

## FAQ

<br />

<details>
  <summary><h4>When should I use a Form page on my project?</h4></summary>
  <div>
    Use a Form page when merchants need to create or edit an object, such as products, sellers or promotions. They will define an object by inputting data, selecting options and submitting them.
  </div>
</details>


<details>
  <summary><h4>What are the basic features of a Form page?</h4></summary>
  <div>
    <p>A Form page usually includes:
      <ul>
        <li>A <em>Save</em> Button for merchants to submit data when creating or editing an object.</li>
        <li>A <em>Cancel</em> Button for merchants to discard any changes and leave the form.</li>
        <li>A <em>Back</em> Button for merchants to go back to the previous screen and leave the form.</li>
        <li>A <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/menu">Menu</a> with default actions like <em>Copy URL, Export</em> and <em>Delete</em> that usually appears in the Edit view, when the object already exists in the system. They can be adjusted according the the context you are working with.</li>
        <li>Static validation, which happens on the front end right after the user types anything.</li>
        <li>Dynamic validation, which happens on the back end after data is submitted.</li>
        <li>Form sections to separate different moments of the form, which may include:
          <ul>
            <li><strong>Input fields</strong>: <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/text-input">TextInput</a>, <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/text-area">TextArea</a>, <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/number-input">NumberInput</a>, <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/experimental/date-picker">DatePicker</a> and <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/experimental/combobox">Combobox</a>.</li>
            <li><strong>Controls</strong>: <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/checkbox">Checkbox</a>, <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/radio">Radio</a>, <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/select">Select</a> and <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/switch">Switch</a>.</li>
            <li><strong>List</strong>: <a href="https://admin-ui.vercel.app/components/data-view">DataView</a></li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
    </p>
  </div>
</details>


<br />
